title: Nikola Motors partners with ENGS Finance - www.electrive.com
content: Nikola Motors partners with ENGS Finance  www.electrive.com
description: In the USA, Nikola has signed an agreement with ENGS Commercial Finance to facilitate sales of Class 8 Nikola Tre battery-electric vehicles (BEVs) and Nikola Tre hydrogen fuel-cell electric vehicles (FCEVs).
